channel.title: Kyle XY - ABC Family
channel.description:
Kyle XY: 10/10
A teen that is smart and stuff. watch the first season here: http://abcfamily.go.com/kylexy/index.html
Chars:
Kyle
Nicole - social worker
Amanda - girl Kyle likes
Charile - Amanda's boyfriend
Lori - one of the two Tragers childrens
Josh - The other kid, the brat
Steven - Nicole's husband
Declan - Lori's boyfriend
Tom Foss - Watching over Kyle
The second season is coming next year i believe with 13 more espisodes
[u][b]Please do not put 0/10 just because you never seen it[/b][/u]

item.title: Kyle XY - ABC Family

Im gonna have to say 10/10 for awesomeness its a very good show.

item.title: Kyle XY - ABC Family

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

reece844:

this is a true thing that happens! its not a chain letter! its kinda scary at first but it really works!! paste this message into 3 comments and press ALT F4 and your crushes name will appear on the screen!!! its soo wierd

You can fuck right off.
